# [Interview #692: 17th Shard Interview, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=692#22)

#### 17th Shard

What is the name of the Shard which is the Almighty?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Ah... RAFO!

#### Footnote

It's Honor, and the original person holding the shard is Tanavast.
